name: Yoselin Sanchez
coverLetter:
Hello,


Please accept my resume as I am interested in a part-time position. I am a self-motivated, passionate, and positive candidate with five years of exceptional customer service/sales experience via phone and in person. My drive, ambition, and skills make me an ideal candidate for this position. I am pleased to state that I have an impeccable work ethic with the ability to work effectively as part of a team or independently. Due to my overall work experience, I have the ability to build rapport with people of diverse backgrounds and provide excellent service at all times. I strive to prove excellence in all that I do. I am strongly familiar with Marijuana products, treatments and methods of consumption and only hope to continue to learn more about its benefits and advancements. I am seeking for an opportunity to surround myself with like minded individuals where I can demonstrate my skills as a leader and continue to grow as a person while contributing to the growth of this industry. Thank you for your time, I look forward to hearing from you.  


Available

Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday: 5pm-12am

Friday-Sunday: Anytime
